name: @froko/ng-essentials
description: An essentials schematics for new Angular applications
author: Patrick Ineichen <github@frokonet.ch>

scripts.prebuild: npm run schema2ts && npm run verify
scripts.verify: npm run format && npm run lint && jest --bail
scripts.sandbox-app:clean: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox-app && git clean -f -d sandbox-app && rimraf sandbox-app/.vscode
scripts.sandbox-app:schematic: npm link && cd sandbox-app && npm link @froko/ng-essentials
scripts.sandbox-app:add:core: npm run sandbox-app:schematic && cd sandbox-app && schematics @froko/ng-essentials:ng-add
scripts.sandbox-app:add:all: npm run sandbox-app:schematic && cd sandbox-app && schematics @froko/ng-essentials:ng-add --jest --cypress --husky
scripts.sandbox-workspace:clean: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox-workspace && git clean -f -d sandbox-workspace && rimraf sandbox-workspace/.vscode
scripts.sandbox-workspace:schematic: npm link && cd sandbox-workspace && npm link @froko/ng-essentials
scripts.sandbox-workspace:add:core: npm run sandbox-workspace:schematic && cd sandbox-workspace && schematics @froko/ng-essentials:ng-add
scripts.sandbox-workspace:add:all: npm run sandbox-workspace:schematic && cd sandbox-workspace && schematics @froko/ng-essentials:ng-add --jest --cypress --husky
